ground_truth: Harry banks around and sees Peter swinging between the buildings. He zooms down after Peter, who swings into a narrow gap between the tall buildings, propelling himself along from thread to thread. Harry turns the Sky Stick side on so he can fly along the narrow gap, dodging fire escapes and air con units as he air boards after Peter. Harry pulls a glowing green sword from a scabbard on his back and slashes wildly at Peter, who swerves out of the way. Harry soars above Peter, then plummets down to stab him but misses. Harry hurls a small, golden pumpkin bomb at Peter. It opens up in mid-air into a kind of flying metallic bat. Harry throws more bombs at Peter. They slash at Peter who desperately tries to swing out of their way. He jumps off a pipe and swings back the way he came, just missing Harry. The winged bombs surge after Peter and Harry gets caught in the swarm. One of them embeds its wing in his shoulder. He yanks it out, zooms upwards into the air, and swoops on after Peter. Peter swings backwards, shooting webbing at the bombs and disabling them. One of them is caught in a thread, and Peter swings it back at Harry. Harry flies through the explosion, shielding his eyes. He hits the line of thread stretched out in front of him and bounces off a pipe and a wall, tumbling towards an alleyway below. Peter, his eyes widening with alarm, swings down towards him. Harry lies motionless on the ground. Peter hurries over to his unconscious old friend. He crouches down and holds his ear to Harry's mouth. He yanks open Harry's dark green jacket and starts pumping his chest. He listens again for signs of life. He carries his friend to an emergency room. Peter watches through a window as a crash team tries to revive Harry. A detective hands a file to tall, thin-faced Captain Stacy. A police dog handler blows a whistle and points. Flint sprints across waste ground with armed officers running behind him. As he reaches a wire mesh fence an Alsatian lunges at him. He wrestles the dog off and punches it away. Flint climbs. Flint runs on and suddenly falls into a huge pit. He tumbles down a concrete wall and lands heavily on a pile of sand in the bottom of the pit. Slowly, he hauls himself to his feet and looks desperately from side to side. He's caught in a dazzling beam of light. Above the pit, three glowing capacitors begin to rotate like a merry-go-round. Flint looks up nervously as the capacitors descend towards him and spin around him. They kick up a sandstorm with Flint trapped in the middle.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description:
Certainly! Here's the transformed text with synonyms:

---

Harry banks around and perceives Peter swinging amid the edifices. He zooms downward after Peter, who swings into a narrow crevice between the lofty edifices, propelling himself along from strand to strand. Harry turns the Sky Stick side on so he can fly along the narrow crevice, dodging fire escapes and air con units as he air boards after Peter. Harry pulls a glowing green blade from a scabbard on his back and slashes wildly at Peter, who veers out of the way. Harry soars above Peter, then plunges down to stab him but misses. Harry flings a small, golden pumpkin explosive at Peter. It opens up in mid-air into a kind of flying metallic creature. Harry throws more explosives at Peter. They slash at Peter who desperately tries to swing out of their way. He leaps off a pipe and swings back the way he came, just missing Harry. The winged explosives surge after Peter and Harry gets caught in the swarm. One of them embeds its wing in his shoulder. He yanks it out, zooms upwards into the air, and swoops on after Peter. Peter swings backwards, shooting webbing at the explosives and disabling them. One of them is caught in a strand, and Peter swings it back at Harry. Harry flies through the explosion, shielding his eyes. He hits the line of strand stretched out in front of him and bounces off a pipe and a wall, tumbling towards an alleyway below. Peter, his eyes widening with alarm, swings down towards him. Harry lies motionless on the ground. Peter hurries over to his unconscious old companion. He crouches down and holds his ear to Harry's mouth. He yanks open Harry's dark green jacket and starts pumping his chest. He listens again for signs of vitality. He carries his companion to an emergency room. Peter watches through a window as a crash team tries to resuscitate Harry. A detective hands a dossier to tall, thin-faced Captain Stacy. A police canine handler blows a whistle and gestures. Flint sprints across waste ground with armed officers running behind him. As he reaches a wire mesh barrier an Alsatian lunges at him. He wrestles the canine off and punches it away. Flint scales. Flint runs on and suddenly plunges into a huge pit. He tumbles down a concrete wall and lands heavily on a pile of sand in the bottom of the pit. Slowly, he hauls himself to his feet and looks desperately from side to side. He's caught in a dazzling beam of light. Above the pit, three glowing capacitors begin to rotate like a merry-go-round. Flint looks up nervously as the capacitors descend towards him and spin around him. They kick up a sandstorm with Flint trapped in the middle.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Peter is seen by Harry as he swings between the buildings. Peter is zoomed down after by Harry, who swings into a narrow gap between the tall buildings, propelling himself along from thread to thread. The Sky Stick is turned side on by Harry so he can fly along the narrow gap, dodging fire escapes and air con units while air boarding after Peter. A glowing green sword is pulled by Harry from a scabbard on his back, and Peter is slashed at wildly, who swerves out of the way. Above Peter, Harry soars, then plummets down to stab him but a miss is made. A small, golden pumpkin bomb is hurled at Peter by Harry. It opens up in mid-air into a kind of flying metallic bat. More bombs are thrown at Peter by Harry. They slash at Peter, who desperately tries to swing out of their way. A jump is made off a pipe, and the way he came is swung back along by Peter, just missing Harry. The winged bombs surge after Peter, and Harry is caught in the swarm. One of them embeds its wing in his shoulder. It is yanked out by him, he zooms upwards into the air, and swoops on after Peter. Backwards, Peter swings, shooting webbing at the bombs and disabling them. In a thread, one of them is caught, and it is swung back at Harry by Peter. Through the explosion, Harry flies, shielding his eyes. The line of thread stretched out in front of him is hit, and a pipe and a wall are bounced off by him, tumbling towards an alleyway below. With alarm widening his eyes, Peter swings down towards him. Harry is found lying motionless on the ground. Over to his unconscious old friend, Peter hurries. Down, he crouches and his ear to Harry's mouth is held. He yanks open Harry's dark green jacket and his chest is pumped by Peter. Again, he listens for signs of life. His friend is carried to an emergency room by Peter. Through a window, Peter watches as a crash team tries to revive Harry. To tall, thin-faced Captain Stacy, a file is handed by a detective. A whistle is blown by a police dog handler, who points. Flint is sprinted across waste ground by him, with armed officers running behind him. As a wire mesh fence is reached by him, an Alsatian lunges at him. The dog is wrestled off and punched away by him. Flint climbs. A huge pit is suddenly fallen into by Flint, who runs on. He tumbles down a concrete wall and lands heavily on a pile of sand in the bottom of the pit. Slowly, to his feet, he hauls himself and desperately looks from side to side. In a dazzling beam of light, he's caught. Above the pit, three glowing capacitors are made to rotate like a merry-go-round. Nervously, Flint looks up as the capacitors descend towards him and they are spun around him. A sandstorm is kicked up by them with Flint trapped in the middle.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Harry spots Peter swinging between the buildings and zooms after him. Peter threads through a narrow gap between tall structures, and Harry maneuvers his Sky Stick sideways to follow, dodging obstacles like fire escapes. Pulling a glowing green sword, Harry slashes at Peter, who swerves away. Harry flies above Peter and plunges down but misses. He throws a small, golden pumpkin bomb, which transforms into a metallic bat. More bombs follow, slashing at Peter. Peter evades them and, swinging back, narrowly avoids Harry. The winged bombs pursue Peter, one lodging in Harry's shoulder. He removes it and continues chasing Peter, who swings backwards, using webbing to disable the bombs. Peter captures one bomb with a thread and flings it at Harry. Harry crashes through the explosion, hitting a line and ricocheting off a pipe, falling into an alley. Alarmed, Peter swings down to Harry, who is motionless. Peter checks him, opens Harry's jacket, performs chest compressions, and listens for signs of life. He carries Harry to an emergency room, watching as a team works on him. Meanwhile, a detective gives Captain Stacy a file. A dog handler points at Flint, sprinting across waste ground with armed officers. Flint reaches a fence, wrestles off a lunging dog, climbs the fence, and falls into a massive pit. He lands on sand and looks around desperately when a bright light catches him. Above, three glowing capacitors spin like a merry-go-round, descending. Flint stands trapped as a sandstorm whirls around him.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Harry follows Peter through a narrow gap between tall buildings, dodging fire escapes and air con units. Harry grabs a glowing green sword and attacks, but Peter swerves away. Harry hurls golden pumpkin bombs that turn into flying metallic bats. The bombs chase Peter, who swings away and disables them with webbing. Peter swings one bomb back at Harry, who is then knocked into an alleyway. Peter rushes to his unconscious friend, starts CPR, and carries him to an emergency room, watching as a team tries to revive Harry. Meanwhile, Flint runs from the police, wrestles a dog, and falls into a pit. There, he's caught in light as spinning capacitors create a sandstorm around him.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Harry skillfully banks around a corner and catches sight of Peter, who is energetically swinging between the towering buildings. Without hesitation, Harry zooms downwards in pursuit of Peter, who skillfully maneuvers himself into a narrow gap between the immense skyscrapers, propelling himself along from one thread to the next. To navigate through the confined space, Harry adeptly turns the Sky Stick sideways, allowing him to fly through the narrow gap while skillfully dodging fire escapes and protruding air conditioning units as he airboards after Peter. Displaying agility and determination, Harry pulls out a glowing green sword from a scabbard strapped to his back and slashes wildly at Peter, who deftly swerves out of harm's way. In a swift motion, Harry soars above Peter, then plummets down with intent to stab him, only to miss his target. Undeterred, Harry hurls a small, golden pumpkin bomb in Peter's direction. This bomb opens up in mid-air, transforming into a kind of metallic bat with wings. Harry proceeds to throw more of these bombs at Peter. The bombs, sharp and relentless, slash toward Peter, who is desperately trying to swing out of their path. In a quick, agile move, Peter jumps off a pipe and swings back the way he originally came, narrowly avoiding Harry. The winged bombs persistently surge after Peter, and Harry inadvertently gets caught in the swarm. One of them embeds its sharp wing into his shoulder. Harry grimaces as he yanks it out, then zooms upwards into the sky, swooping onward in pursuit of Peter. As Peter swings backward, he shoots webbing at the bombs, effectively disabling them. One of the bombs is caught and tangled in a web thread, prompting Peter to swing it back toward Harry. Despite the impending explosion, Harry bravely flies through it, shielding his eyes. However, he collides with the line of thread stretched out in front of him, bouncing off a pipe and a wall, and tumbling uncontrollably toward an alleyway below. Peter's eyes widen with alarm as he swings down swiftly toward Harry. Harry, now motionless on the ground, is in distress. Peter quickly approaches his unconscious old friend, crouches down, and places his ear close to Harry’s mouth to check for breathing. He urgently yanks open Harry’s dark green jacket and begins pumping his chest, trying to revive him. After listening again for any signs of life, Peter decides to carry Harry to an emergency room. From just beyond a window, Peter watches with concern as a crash team inside works to revive Harry. Nearby, a detective hands over a file to the tall, thin-faced Captain Stacy, indicating the seriousness of the situation. Meanwhile, a police dog handler alerts his team by blowing a whistle and pointing as Flint begins sprinting across the waste ground with armed officers following closely behind him. As Flint reaches a wire mesh fence, an Alsatian dog lunges at him. He wrestles with the dog, eventually punching it away. Flint starts to climb, attempting to escape, but as he runs on, he suddenly falls into an enormous pit. He tumbles down a concrete wall and lands heavily on a pile of sand at the base of the pit. Slowly, with effort, he hauls himself to his feet and casts a desperate gaze from side to side. He finds himself caught in a bewildering, dazzling beam of light. Above him, at the rim of the pit, three glowing capacitors begin to rotate in a circular motion like a merry-go-round. Flint glances up nervously as the capacitors descend toward him and commence spinning around him. They kick up a fierce sandstorm, with Flint trapped helplessly at its center.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Harry, with impressive skill and precision, expertly banks around a challenging corner and quickly catches sight of Peter. Peter is energetically swinging between the towering, majestic buildings that dominate the cityscape. Without a moment of hesitation, Harry zooms downwards at remarkable speed in eager pursuit of Peter. Peter demonstrates undeniable skill as he maneuverers himself into a narrow gap between the immense skyscrapers, propelling himself efficiently from one thread of webbing to the next. To successfully navigate through the confined space, Harry adeptly turns the Sky Stick sideways, allowing him to fly smoothly through the tight gap while expertly dodging fire escapes and protruding air conditioning units as he airboards after Peter with unwavering determination. Displaying both agility and determination, Harry skillfully pulls out a glowing green sword from a scabbard securely strapped to his back and begins to slash wildly at Peter. However, Peter deftly swerves out of harm's way, avoiding the attack. In a swift and daring motion, Harry soars above Peter, then dramatically plummets downwards with intent to stab him, only to miss his intended target. Undeterred and persistent, Harry hurls a small, golden pumpkin bomb in Peter's direction. This bomb opens up in mid-air, transforming into a kind of metallic bat with mechanical wings. Harry proceeds to throw more of these bombs with increasing intensity at Peter. The bombs, both sharp and relentless, slash toward Peter, who is desperately trying to swing out of their unpredictable path. In a quick, agile move, Peter jumps off a pipe and swings back the way he originally came, narrowly avoiding Harry and the pursuing bombs. The winged bombs, relentless in their pursuit, surge after Peter, and Harry inadvertently gets caught among the swarm. One of these mechanical creatures embeds its sharp wing into his shoulder. Harry grimaces in pain as he yanks it out, then resolutely zooms upwards into the sky, swooping onward with renewed determination in pursuit of Peter. As Peter swings backward, he cleverly shoots webbing at the bombs, effectively disabling them. One of the bombs becomes ensnared and tangled in a web thread, prompting Peter to swing it back toward Harry. Despite the impending explosion, Harry bravely flies through it, shielding his eyes from the chaos. However, he collides with the line of web thread stretched tightly in front of him, causing him to bounce off a pipe and a wall, ultimately tumbling uncontrollably toward the alleyway below. Peter's eyes widen with alarm and concern as he swiftly swings down toward the now-distressed Harry. Harry, now lying motionless on the ground, is in apparent distress. Peter quickly approaches his unconscious old friend, crouches down, and places his ear close to Harry’s mouth to listen for any signs of breathing. He urgently yanks open Harry’s dark green jacket and begins pumping his chest with purpose, attempting to revive him. After listening intently once again for any signs of life, Peter makes the crucial decision to carry Harry swiftly to an emergency room. From just beyond a hospital window, Peter watches with deep concern as a crash team inside works intently to revive Harry. Nearby, a detective hands over a vital file to the tall, thin-faced Captain Stacy, highlighting the seriousness of the unfolding situation. Meanwhile, a police dog handler alerts his team by blowing a whistle and pointing with urgency as Flint begins sprinting across the waste ground with armed officers closely following behind him. As Flint reaches a formidable wire mesh fence, an Alsatian dog lunges at him. He wrestles with the dog, eventually managing to punch it away. Flint starts to climb the fence, desperately attempting to escape, but as he continues to run, he suddenly falls into an enormous, unforeseen pit. He tumbles down a steep concrete wall and lands heavily on a pile of sand at the base of the pit. Slowly, with effort, he hauls himself to his feet and casts a desperate gaze from side to side. He finds himself caught in a bewildering, dazzling beam of light. Above him, at the rim of the pit, three glowing capacitors begin to rotate in a circular motion similar to a merry-go-round. Flint glances up nervously as the capacitors descend ominously toward him and commence spinning around him. They kick up a fierce sandstorm, with Flint trapped helplessly at its chaotic center.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Harry sharply banks around, his eyes locking onto Peter, who is skillfully swinging between the towering buildings. Determined to catch up, Harry speeds down in pursuit of Peter, who is deftly navigating a narrow gap between the skyscrapers, propelling himself forward by shooting webs from one point to another. In reaction, Harry expertly tilts his Sky Stick to the side, aligning it for a streamlined flight through the confined space. He weaves through the narrow gap, deftly maneuvering around obstacles like fire escapes and air conditioning units, all while keeping his focus on Peter. In one swift motion, Harry retrieves a glowing green sword from the scabbard strapped to his back, slashing wildly at Peter, who nimbly swerves out of harm's way. Undeterred, Harry ascends above Peter with a burst of speed and then sharply plummets downwards, aiming to stab him, but Peter skillfully evades his strike. Quickly adjusting his approach, Harry launches a small, golden pumpkin bomb at Peter. The bomb springs open mid-air, transforming into a metallic bat-like creature that flaps menacingly toward its target. Seizing the opportunity, Harry hurls more of these bombs in Peter's direction. As they attack, Peter frantically swings to avoid them, jumping off a pipe and reversing his trajectory, narrowly missing Harry in the process. The relentless winged bombs pursue Peter with determination, and Harry inadvertently becomes entangled in their chaotic swarm. One of the bombs embeds its sharp wing into Harry's shoulder, causing him to wince in pain. With a quick motion, he pulls it out, then accelerates upwards into the air, recovering from the chaos to continue his pursuit of Peter. Meanwhile, Peter executes a backward swing, strategically shooting his webbing at the bombs to disable them. Successfully ensnaring one in his web, Peter swings it back toward Harry, who finds himself flying through the subsequent explosion, shielding his eyes from the debris. The aftermath leaves Harry vulnerable, causing him to collide with a stretched line of webbing. He ricochets off a pipe and a wall, tumbling uncontrollably toward the alleyway below. Sensing the danger, Peter's eyes widen in alarm as he swings down rapidly toward Harry. Landing quickly, Peter rushes to his unconscious friend, his concern palpable. He crouches beside Harry, urgently placing his ear to Harry's mouth to detect any sign of breathing. Realizing the gravity of the situation, Peter swiftly unzips Harry's dark green jacket and begins performing chest compressions, pausing periodically to listen for signs of life. Determined to save him, Peter eventually carries Harry to the nearest emergency room, his worry escalating as he watches through a window while a crash team fights to revive his old friend. Meanwhile, a detective passes a file to the tall, thin-faced Captain Stacy, who stands nearby. Elsewhere, a police dog handler blows a whistle and gestures urgently, directing attention to Flint, who is sprinting across an expanse of waste ground with armed officers hot on his trail. As Flint closes in on a wire mesh fence, an Alsatian lunges at him. He struggles to fend off the dog, eventually punching it away. With no time to spare, Flint clambers up the fence, ultimately running forward only to suddenly plunge into a gargantuan pit. He tumbles down the harsh concrete wall, landing hard on a pile of sand at the pit's bottom. Slowly, Flint pulls himself to his feet, his eyes darting anxiously from side to side, realizing he's trapped. Suddenly, a dazzling beam of light catches him, illuminating his predicament. Above the pit, three luminescent capacitors begin rotating like a merry-go-round, descending toward him with an ominous spin. Flint looks up in nervous anticipation as the capacitors close in, their rotation whipping up a ferocious sandstorm with Flint caught in the eye of the swirling chaos.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
Harry pursues Peter as he swings through a narrow gap between buildings. Adjusting his flight to navigate obstacles, Harry draws a glowing green sword and attacks, but Peter evades. Harry then launches airborne bombs at Peter, who maneuvers to avoid them. As Peter successfully swings back, one bomb's wing injures Harry, prompting him to ascend and continue the chase. Peter uses his webbing to neutralize the bombs, sending one back towards Harry, who flies through the resulting explosion. Harry collides with a web line, ricocheting off structures before falling into an alleyway. Alarmed, Peter rushes to his unconscious friend, performs CPR, and transports him to the emergency room, where he anxiously observes attempts to revive Harry.

Meanwhile, Flint, pursued by officers, encounters a police dog but escapes, only to fall into a pit. Trapped in the sand at the bottom, he is caught in a powerful sandstorm created by rotating, descending capacitors.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Harry banks around and sees Peter, the young hero known as Spider-Man, swinging between the buildings of New York City. He zooms down after Peter, who swings into a narrow gap between the towering skyscrapers of Manhattan, propelling himself along from thread to thread with his web-shooters, a technology he ingeniously developed. Harry turns the Sky Stick, his advanced hoverboard designed by Oscorp Industries, side on so he can fly along the narrow gap, expertly dodging the iron fire escapes and bulky air conditioning units as he air boards after Peter. Harry pulls a glowing green sword from a scabbard on his back, a high-tech weapon powered by an unknown energy source, and slashes wildly at Peter, who swerves out of the way with the agility of a practiced acrobat. Harry soars above Peter, then plummets down to stab him but misses due to Peter's quick reflexes. Harry hurls a small, golden pumpkin bomb at Peter. It opens up in mid-air, transforming into a kind of flying metallic bat, a signature gadget of the Green Goblin. Harry throws more bombs at Peter. They slash at Peter who desperately tries to swing out of their way, a skill he honed over years of fighting crime. He jumps off a pipe and swings back the way he came, just missing Harry. The winged bombs surge after Peter and Harry gets caught in the swarm. One of them embeds its wing in his shoulder. Wincing in pain, he yanks it out, zooms upwards into the air, and swoops on after Peter. Peter swings backwards, shooting webbing at the bombs and disabling them with precision. One of them is caught in a thread, and Peter swings it back at Harry. Harry flies through the explosion, shielding his eyes from the blinding flash. He hits the line of thread stretched out in front of him and bounces off a pipe and a wall, tumbling towards an alleyway below. Peter, his eyes widening with alarm, swings down towards him with concern for his old friend. Harry lies motionless on the ground. Peter hurries over to his unconscious old friend, a fellow student from Midtown High. He crouches down and holds his ear to Harry's mouth, checking for any signs of breath. He yanks open Harry's dark green jacket and starts pumping his chest with the urgency of someone trained in CPR. He listens again for signs of life. He then carries his friend to an emergency room at New York-Presbyterian Hospital. Peter watches through a window as a crash team tries to revive Harry, the son of Norman Osborn, the infamous former CEO of Oscorp. A detective hands a file to tall, thin-faced Captain Stacy, a respected officer in the NYPD. A police dog handler blows a whistle and points. Flint Marko, a small-time criminal also known as Sandman, sprints across waste ground with armed officers running behind him. As he reaches a wire mesh fence an Alsatian lunges at him. Flint, in desperation, wrestles the dog off and punches it away, a testament to his hardened life on the run. Flint climbs. Flint runs on and suddenly falls into a huge pit. He tumbles down a concrete wall and lands heavily on a pile of sand in the bottom of the pit. Slowly, he hauls himself to his feet, looking desperately from side to side for an escape. He's caught in a dazzling beam of light. Above the pit, three glowing capacitors, part of an experimental particle accelerator, begin to rotate like a merry-go-round. Flint looks up nervously as the capacitors descend towards him and spin around him, inadvertently causing his transformation. They kick up a sandstorm with Flint trapped in the middle.

High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. Peter hurries over to his unconscious old friend. He crouches down and holds his ear to Harry's mouth. He yanks open Harry's dark green jacket and starts pumping his chest. He listens again for signs of life. He carries his friend to an emergency room. Peter watches through a window as a crash team tries to revive Harry. A detective hands a file to tall thinfaced Captain Stacy. A police dog handler blows a whistle and points. Flint sprints across waste ground with armed officers running behind him. As he reaches a wire mesh fence an Alsatian lunges at him. He wrestles the dog off and punches it away. Flint climbs. Flint runs on and suddenly falls into a huge pit. He tumbles down a concrete wall and lands heavily on a pile of sand in the bottom of the pit. Slowly he hauls himself to his feet and looks desperately from side to side. He is caught in a dazzling beam of light. Above the pit three glowing capacitors begin to rotate like a merrygoround. Flint looks up nervously as the capacitors descend towards him and spin around him. They kick up a sandstorm with Flint trapped in the middle.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Harry banks around and sees Peter swinging between the buildings. He zooms down after Peter who swings into a narrow gap between the tall buildings propelling himself along from thread to thread. Harry turns the Sky Stick side on so he can fly along the narrow gap. dodging fire escapes and air con units as he air boards after Peter. Harry pulls a glowing green sword from a scabbard on his back and slashes wildly at Peter who swerves out of the way. Harry soars above Peter then plummets down to stab him but misses. Harry hurls a small golden pumpkin bomb at Peter. It opens up in midair into a kind of flying metallic bat. Harry throws more bombs at Peter. They slash at Peter who desperately tries to swing out of their way. He wrestles the dog off and punches it away. Flint climbs. Flint runs on and suddenly falls into a huge pit. He tumbles down a concrete wall and lands heavily on a pile of sand in the bottom of the pit. Slowly he hauls himself to his feet and looks desperately from side to side. He is caught in a dazzling beam of light. Above the pit three glowing capacitors begin to rotate like a merrygoround. Flint looks up nervously as the capacitors descend towards him and spin around him. They kick up a sandstorm with Flint trapped in the middle.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Harry banks around and sees Peter swinging between the buildings. He zooms down after Peter who swings into a narrow gap between the tall buildings propelling himself along from thread to thread. Harry turns the Sky Stick side on so he can fly along the narrow gap. dodging fire escapes and air con units as he air boards after Peter. He is caught in a dazzling beam of light. Above the pit three glowing capacitors begin to rotate like a merrygoround. Flint looks up nervously as the capacitors descend towards him and spin around him. They kick up a sandstorm with Flint trapped in the middle.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Gwen somersaults over and spots Tony gliding beneath the bridges. She darts up before Tony, who glides into a spacious lagoon beneath the short bridges, launching himself across from vine to vine. Gwen spins the Cloud Board sideways so she can sail across the spacious lagoon, weaving around chimneys and satellite dishes as she cloud surfs before Tony. Gwen draws a shimmering blue dagger from a holster on her belt and swings fiercely at Tony, who twirls out of the path. Gwen glides below Tony, then rises up to strike him but overshoots. Gwen lobs a tiny, silver apple grenade at Tony. It blossoms mid-drop into a sort of buzzing silver owl. Gwen sends more grenades at Tony. They slice at Tony who frantically attempts to glide away from their reach. He vaults off a ladder and glides back to where he started, narrowly avoiding Gwen. The metallic owls whirl after Tony and Gwen finds herself caught in the flurry. One of them drives its talon into her arm. She pulls it out, darts skyward into the clouds, and spirals after Tony. Tony glides in reverse, casting strands at the owls and neutralizing them. One of them is ensnared in a vine, and Tony hurls it back at Gwen. Gwen drifts through the detonation, covering her face. She collides with the strand of vine stretched out above her and bounces off a ladder and a fence, plunging towards a courtyard below. Tony, his eyes widening with fear, glides down after her. Gwen lies unmoving on the pavement. Tony rushes over to his unconscious childhood buddy. He kneels down and checks his hand to Gwen's lips. He unzips Gwen's light blue hoodie and begins pressing her chest. He listens again for any breath. He carries his buddy to an ambulance. Tony peers through a curtain as a rescue team attempts to revive Gwen. A sergeant passes a note to short, round-faced Officer Lee. A search falconer blows a horn and gestures. Clay charges across barren land with guards dashing behind him. As he climbs a chain-link barricade a Labrador pounces at him. He grapples the hound off and shoves it away. Clay scales up. Clay dashes on and abruptly stumbles into a deep sinkhole. He crashes down a brick face and lands harshly on a mound of gravel at the base of the pit. Gradually, he pushes himself to his legs and gazes anxiously from corner to corner. He's trapped in a blinding shaft of light. Above the pit, four blazing turbines start to whirl like a carousel. Clay glances up warily as the turbines lower towards him and twirl around him. They whip up a dust storm with Clay stuck in the vortex.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Harry pursues Peter, who is swinging between buildings. To follow, Harry maneuvers his Sky Stick through narrow gaps, avoiding obstacles. He draws a glowing sword, attacking Peter, who dodges. Harry misses a stab attempt and throws pumpkin bombs, which turn into metallic bats. As they swarm Peter, he evades and disables them with webs, redirecting one bomb back at Harry. The ensuing explosion sends Harry crashing into an alley. Alarmed, Peter swings down, checks Harry’s condition, and rushes him to the emergency room. Meanwhile, Flint, pursued by police, escapes across waste ground but falls into a pit. Trapped, he faces rotating capacitors that stir a sandstorm around him.
